text: Shivinder Singh Sidhu (October 13, 1929 - 25 October, 2018)"Shivinder Singh Sidhu sworn in as former Goa Governor" , PTI (The Hindu), July 21, 2008. was an Indian politician. He became the Governor of the state of Manipur on 6 August 2004. Sidhu was also the Governor of Meghalaya from October 2007 to 1 July 2008 and Governor of Goa from 22 July 2008 to 26 August 2011."Three more governors shuffled" , IST, TNN (The Times of India), July 9, 2008. Sidhu died on 25 October 2018 at the age of 89.Former Meghalaya, Manipur Governor SS Sidhu no more ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Governors of Goa Category:Governors of Manipur Category:Governors of Meghalaya
title: Shivinder Singh Sidhu
